Package JsonParsing.Transportation

Class JsonLineReader

java.lang.Object
JsonParsing.Transportation.JsonLineReader
public class JsonLineReader
extends java.lang.Object
Class: java.JsonParsing.Transportation.JsonStopsReader

This class reads the response of the TMB API when requested to send the Buses waiting time on a specific stop that is supported by TMB. The response is sent from the API module to this class as a Json String.

This class has no attributes and only one method, this method checks the Json String it received, if there is any error with requested parameters that resulted in a problem in the response, then this method will throw a LineException.

However, if the response is successful, then the method will parse the information in the json string and return an array of type Line that contains all the buses that stop at the specified stop with the time left for each to arrive at the stop.

See Also:
Line, Stop

    • readStopLine

      public static java.util.ArrayList<Line> readStopLine​(java.lang.String input, java.lang.String stopId) throws LineException
      reads all the information about the bus lines that stop at a specified stop
      Parameters:
      input - a Json string that contains the information the Bus lines that stop in a specified stations
      stopId - the code of the stop we are receiving its information
      Returns:
      an Array of all the Bus lines that stop at the specified stop
      Throws:
      LineException - if the stop code specified did not exist after being sent to the API
